hotelMenu.description: Classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.
Crisp romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
Juicy grilled chicken served on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, and mayo.
Traditional Italian pasta dish with creamy sauce, pancetta, and parmesan.
Rich and creamy Indian curry served with basmati rice or naan bread.
Classic beef burger topped with melted cheese, served with fries.
Warm chocolate cake with a gooey center, served with vanilla ice cream.
Perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with roasted vegetables and lemon butter sauce.
A mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory soy-ginger sauce.
Classic Italian dessert with layers of mascarpone cheese, coffee, and cocoa.
